app.admin.system_info module¶

app.admin.system_info.cpu_temp()[source]¶

The shell command (vcgencmd measure_temp) returns temp=64.5’C This function returns 64.5’C

app.admin.system_info.db_size()[source]¶
The command returns:

EMPTY LINE app.db 0 chaudiere.db 536576 chaudiere_hour.db 8192 chaudiere_minute.db 241664

This function returns:

{‘app.db’: ‘0 Mo’, ‘chaudiere.db’: ‘537 Mo’, ‘chaudiere_hour.db’: ‘8 Mo’, ‘chaudiere_minute.db’: ‘242 Mo’}

app.admin.system_info.disk_space()[source]¶

The shell command (df with options…) returns /dev/root 7,0G 3,5G 52% This function returns {‘cpu_temp’: ‘7,0G’, ‘used’: ‘3,5G’, ‘used_percent’: ‘52%’}
